rows.label: qst200519_msg0101
rows.name:
Cookies with a different taste in
each piece... I've created something
interesting, if I say so myself.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0102
rows.name:
The texture is crispy
and not bad at all!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0103
rows.name:
This should be good enough
for the shop menu.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0104
rows.name:
Then next... shall I try
making a prototype pudding?

rows.label: qst200519_msg0105
rows.name:
A shop with only cookies
would be a bit lonely.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0106
rows.name:
I've thought of about four
recipes for pudding...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0107
rows.name:
I hope there's something
delicious enough to sell
in the shop among these...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0108
rows.name:
Hmm... It's not spicy, but it
strangely warms the body.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0109
rows.name:
It has the nice aroma of
Arcedian tea leaves, but...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0110
rows.name: What? My body is getting too hot...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0111
rows.name: I need water...!!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0112
rows.name:
...A cookie that makes you want
water is no good. I'll remake it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0113
rows.name:
It's a bittersweet and moist
cookie. Even people who don't
like sweets could eat this.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0114
rows.name: But the slight odor is concerning...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0115
rows.name:
It will be difficult to put this
on the menu. I'll remake it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0201
rows.name:
This is...! My mind gets
sharper with every bite!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0202
rows.name: This could become addictive!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0203
rows.name:
This should be good enough
for the menu. It's sure to
have repeat customers.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0204
rows.name:
...Well then, that's
enough for a warm-up.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0205
rows.name:
The cookies and puddings turned
out fairly well, but...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0206
rows.name:
The star of sweets is,
of course, the cake!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0207
rows.name:
Let's create the most delicious
cake in Alst and make it the
shop's signature item!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0208
rows.name:
It's a pudding that strangely makes
you feel happy when you eat it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0209
rows.name:
But it lacks a certain punch...
Should I try remaking it?

rows.label: qst200519_msg0210
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0211
rows.name:
It's smooth, but it's
just not sweet enough.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0212
rows.name:
I thought if I did it well, I could
achieve the same emotion as when I
ate that first-love white pudding.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0213
rows.name:
Was it impossible to recreate
with my skills? I'll remake it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0214
rows.name:
...For some reason, I feel
sad when I eat this.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0215
rows.name:
My chest hurts... Tears are
welling up in my eyes...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0216
rows.name:
The taste isn't bad, but no one seeks
out sweets to feel depressed...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0217
rows.name:
It can't be helped. I'll
try making something else.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0301
rows.name: I've made a rather nice-looking tart.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0302
rows.name:
But while it looks good,
the taste is no different
from a typical tart...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0303
rows.name: I'll try remaking it one more time.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0304
rows.name:
I tried making a waffle that
boosts good fortune, referencing
astrology and such, but...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0305
rows.name:
The taste doesn't seem to
boost good fortune much...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0306
rows.name: I'll try making a more orthodox cake.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0307
rows.name:
...I was certainly aiming for
something very sweet, but...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0308
rows.name:
This is just too sweet.
One piece feels like two
weeks' worth of sugar.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0309
rows.name:
I can't sell it like this.
I'll have to remake it.
